name: check_visa_eligibility
description: Determines whether an applicant meets the basic eligibility requirements for a specific visa category based on their profile information.

parameters.name: visa_type
parameters.description: The visa category to check eligibility for (e.g., H-1B, O-1, EB-2, K-1)

parameters.name: nationality
parameters.description: Applicant's country of citizenship

parameters.name: education_level
parameters.description: Highest education level (e.g., bachelor, master, doctorate)

parameters.name: years_experience
parameters.description: Years of relevant work experience

parameters.name: current_status
parameters.description: Current immigration status in the US

returnDescription: Eligibility determination with boolean eligible flag, list of met/unmet requirements, and recommended next steps.

name: check_processing_times
description: Retrieves current USCIS processing times for a specific form type at a given service center or field office.

parameters.name: form_number
parameters.description: USCIS form number (e.g., I-130, I-485, I-140)

parameters.name: service_center
parameters.description: USCIS service center or field office name

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Specific category or classification within the form

returnDescription: Processing time range (estimated months), last updated date, and service center information.

name: get_form_requirements
description: Returns the required documents, fees, and supporting evidence needed to file a specific USCIS form.

parameters.name: form_number
parameters.description: USCIS form number (e.g., I-130, I-485, I-765)

parameters.name: filing_category
parameters.description: Specific filing category or basis

returnDescription: List of required documents, filing fee amount, supporting evidence checklist, and filing instructions.

name: lookup_uscis_office
description: Finds the nearest USCIS field office or application support center based on zip code or city.

parameters.name: zip_code
parameters.description: US zip code for location-based lookup

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City name for location-based lookup

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State abbreviation

returnDescription: Office name, address, phone number, hours of operation, and services available.

name: calculate_priority_date
description: Checks the current visa bulletin to determine whether a given priority date is current for a specific preference category and country of chargeability.

parameters.name: preference_category
parameters.description: Employment or family preference category (e.g., EB-2, EB-3, F1, F2A)

parameters.name: country_of_chargeability
parameters.description: Country of birth for visa allocation purposes

parameters.name: priority_date
parameters.description: The applicant's priority date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

returnDescription: Whether date is current, current cutoff date, estimated wait time, and filing date vs final action date.

name: check_travel_restrictions
description: Checks whether an applicant can travel outside the US given their current immigration status and pending applications.

parameters.name: current_status
parameters.description: Current immigration status (e.g., H-1B, F-1, pending AOS)

parameters.name: pending_applications
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of pending USCIS applications

parameters.name: has_advance_parole
parameters.description: Whether the applicant has an approved advance parole document

returnDescription: Travel advisory with risk level, required documents for reentry, and potential consequences of travel.

name: verify_employer_sponsorship
description: Verifies whether an employer meets the requirements to sponsor a foreign worker for a specific visa or green card category.

parameters.name: employer_name
parameters.description: Name of the sponsoring employer

parameters.name: visa_type
parameters.description: Visa or green card category being sponsored

parameters.name: employer_ein
parameters.description: Employer Identification Number

returnDescription: Employer verification status, H-1B dependency status, prior petition history, and any compliance issues.

name: check_public_charge_rule
description: Evaluates whether an applicant may be subject to public charge inadmissibility based on their financial profile and benefit usage.

parameters.name: annual_income
parameters.description: Applicant's annual household income in USD

parameters.name: household_size
parameters.description: Number of people in the household

parameters.name: benefits_received
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of public benefits received

parameters.name: visa_category
parameters.description: Visa category being applied for

returnDescription: Public charge risk assessment, poverty guideline comparison, exempt categories, and I-864 affidavit requirements.

name: get_country_conditions
description: Retrieves current country conditions reports relevant to asylum and protection claims, including human rights data and State Department advisories.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country name to retrieve conditions for

parameters.name: persecution_type
parameters.description: Type of persecution (e.g., political, religious, ethnic, gender-based, LGBTQ)

returnDescription: Country conditions summary, relevant human rights reports, travel advisories, and TPS/DED designations if any.

name: check_asylum_eligibility
description: Evaluates basic asylum eligibility based on the applicant's claim, including the one-year filing deadline and bars to asylum.

parameters.name: entry_date
parameters.description: Date of last entry into the US (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: persecution_ground
parameters.description: Protected ground (race, religion, nationality, political opinion, particular social group)

parameters.name: country_of_origin
parameters.description: Applicant's country of origin

parameters.name: prior_filings
parameters.description: Whether applicant has filed asylum before

returnDescription: Eligibility assessment, one-year deadline status, potential bars to asylum, and recommended filing strategy.

name: check_e2_treaty_requirements
description: Checks whether a country has an E-2 treaty with the US and the specific investment requirements for E-2 treaty investor visa.

parameters.name: nationality
parameters.description: Applicant's country of citizenship

parameters.name: investment_amount
parameters.description: Planned investment amount in USD

parameters.name: business_type
parameters.description: Type of business being invested in

returnDescription: Treaty status, investment sufficiency assessment, marginality analysis, and E-2 specific requirements.

name: check_citizenship_derivation
description: Determines whether a person may have derived or acquired US citizenship automatically through a parent who is a US citizen.

parameters.name: birth_date
parameters.description: Applicant's date of birth (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: parent_citizenship_date
parameters.description: Date parent became US citizen (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: parent_relationship
parameters.description: Relationship to citizen parent (mother/father)

parameters.name: in_legal_custody
parameters.description: Whether the child was in the citizen parent's legal and physical custody

returnDescription: Derivation analysis under INA 320/321, applicable law based on dates, and whether citizenship was automatically acquired.

name: get_fee_schedule
description: Returns the current USCIS filing fees for a specific form, including any biometrics fees and fee waiver eligibility.

parameters.name: form_number
parameters.description: USCIS form number

parameters.name: filing_category
parameters.description: Specific filing category if fees vary

parameters.name: fee_waiver_eligible
parameters.description: Whether to check fee waiver eligibility

returnDescription: Filing fee amount, biometrics fee, total cost, fee waiver eligibility criteria, and payment methods accepted.

name: check_work_authorization
description: Determines what type of work authorization an applicant currently has or is eligible for based on their immigration status.

parameters.name: current_status
parameters.description: Current immigration status

parameters.name: pending_applications
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of pending applications

parameters.name: ead_category
parameters.description: EAD category code if applicable (e.g., C09, C10, A05)

returnDescription: Current work authorization status, EAD eligibility, automatic extensions if applicable, and restrictions.

name: lookup_immigration_judge_stats
description: Retrieves statistics for an immigration judge including grant rates for asylum, cancellation of removal, and other forms of relief.

parameters.name: judge_name
parameters.description: Name of the immigration judge

parameters.name: court_location
parameters.description: Immigration court city or state

parameters.name: relief_type
parameters.description: Type of relief (e.g., asylum, cancellation, withholding)

returnDescription: Judge's grant/denial rates by relief type, average case completion time, and court backlog statistics.

name: get_interpreter_services
description: Finds interpreter and translation services available for immigration proceedings and USCIS interviews.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language needed for interpretation

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: City or state where services are needed

parameters.name: service_type
parameters.description: Type of service (court interpreter, document translation, USCIS interview)

returnDescription: Available interpreter services, estimated costs, certified translator listings, and pro bono options.

name: check_bond_eligibility
description: Determines whether a detained individual is eligible for bond in immigration proceedings and estimates likely bond amounts.

parameters.name: detention_basis
parameters.description: Legal basis for detention (e.g., INA 236(a), INA 236(c) mandatory)

parameters.name: criminal_history
parameters.description: Summary of any criminal convictions

parameters.name: flight_risk_factors
parameters.description: Factors relevant to flight risk assessment

parameters.name: community_ties
parameters.description: Community ties in the US (family, employment, property)

returnDescription: Bond eligibility determination, estimated bond range, mandatory detention assessment, and factors favoring release.

name: verify_marriage_validity
description: Checks whether a marriage is likely to be recognized as valid for immigration purposes based on jurisdiction and circumstances.

parameters.name: marriage_jurisdiction
parameters.description: State or country where marriage was performed

parameters.name: marriage_date
parameters.description: Date of marriage (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: prior_marriages
parameters.description: Whether either spouse has prior marriages

parameters.name: marriage_type
parameters.description: Type of marriage (civil, religious, proxy, common law)

returnDescription: Marriage validity assessment for immigration purposes, potential red flags, and documentation needed to prove bona fide marriage.

name: check_aging_out_risk
description: Calculates whether a child beneficiary is at risk of aging out of eligibility under the Child Status Protection Act (CSPA).

parameters.name: child_birth_date
parameters.description: Child's date of birth (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: petition_filing_date
parameters.description: Date the underlying petition was filed (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: visa_category
parameters.description: Visa preference category

parameters.name: priority_date_current
parameters.description: Whether the priority date is currently current

returnDescription: CSPA age calculation, aging out risk assessment, estimated time until priority date is current, and protective measures available.

name: calculate_unlawful_presence
description: Calculates the total days of unlawful presence accrued and determines whether the 3-year or 10-year inadmissibility bars have been triggered.

parameters.name: status_expiry_date
parameters.description: Date authorized status expired (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: departure_date
parameters.description: Date of departure from US if applicable (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: current_date
parameters.description: Current date for calculation (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: exceptions
parameters.description: Any applicable exceptions (e.g., under 18, pending asylum, VAWA)

returnDescription: Total days of unlawful presence, applicable bars (3-year, 10-year, permanent), exceptions that may apply, and waiver eligibility.

name: get_embassy_wait_times
description: Retrieves current wait times for visa interview appointments at US embassies and consulates worldwide.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country where embassy/consulate is located

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City of the embassy or consulate

parameters.name: visa_type
parameters.description: Type of visa appointment (immigrant, non-immigrant)

returnDescription: Current wait times for interview appointments, nearest available dates, and alternative embassy options.

name: check_vaccine_requirements
description: Returns the required vaccinations for immigration medical exams (Form I-693) based on applicant age and visa category.

parameters.name: applicant_age
parameters.description: Applicant's current age

parameters.name: visa_category
parameters.description: Visa or adjustment category

returnDescription: Required vaccinations list, age-based exemptions, medical exam instructions, and I-693 validity period.

name: verify_military_service_eligibility
description: Checks whether a non-citizen is eligible for US military service and any immigration benefits available through military service.

parameters.name: current_status
parameters.description: Current immigration status

parameters.name: age
parameters.description: Applicant's age

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: Military branch of interest

returnDescription: Military service eligibility, MAVNI program status, expedited naturalization eligibility, and parole-in-place options for family.

name: check_criminal_inadmissibility
description: Analyzes whether criminal convictions make an applicant inadmissible and identifies potential waivers.

parameters.name: convictions
parameters.description: Description of criminal convictions with dates and sentences

parameters.name: visa_category
parameters.description: Visa category being applied for

parameters.name: years_since_conviction
parameters.description: Years since most recent conviction

returnDescription: Inadmissibility analysis, applicable grounds (CIMT, aggravated felony, controlled substance), available waivers, and petty offense exception.

name: get_poverty_guidelines
description: Returns current federal poverty guidelines for I-864 Affidavit of Support income requirements based on household size and state.

parameters.name: household_size
parameters.description: Total household size including sponsor, dependents, and intending immigrants

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State of residence (for Alaska and Hawaii different guidelines apply)

returnDescription: Poverty guideline amount, 125% threshold for I-864, asset calculation rules, and joint sponsor requirements if income insufficient.

name: lookup_approved_labor_certifications
description: Looks up information about PERM labor certification applications including processing times and prevailing wage data.

parameters.name: job_title
parameters.description: Job title for the PERM application

parameters.name: soc_code
parameters.description: Standard Occupational Classification code

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State where the job is located

returnDescription: PERM processing times, prevailing wage ranges by level, audit rates, and common grounds for denial.

name: check_dual_citizenship_rules
description: Provides information about dual citizenship rules for a specific country and whether naturalizing in the US would affect citizenship in the home country.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country of current citizenship

returnDescription: Whether the country allows dual citizenship, any restrictions or requirements, oath of allegiance implications, and tax considerations.

name: get_naturalization_requirements
description: Returns the eligibility requirements for US naturalization including continuous residence, physical presence, and good moral character.

parameters.name: basis
parameters.description: Basis for naturalization (5-year LPR, 3-year marriage to USC, military)

parameters.name: green_card_date
parameters.description: Date permanent residence was granted (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: absences
parameters.description: Summary of absences from the US during statutory period

returnDescription: Eligibility checklist, earliest filing date, continuous residence analysis, physical presence calculation, and exam requirements.

name: check_reentry_permit_eligibility
description: Determines whether a permanent resident needs a reentry permit for planned travel abroad and the application process.

parameters.name: planned_absence_months
parameters.description: Planned duration of absence in months

parameters.name: previous_absences
parameters.description: Summary of prior extended absences

parameters.name: green_card_date
parameters.description: Date of obtaining permanent residence

returnDescription: Reentry permit necessity assessment, application process, validity period, and risk of abandonment of permanent residence.

name: verify_education_credentials
description: Provides guidance on getting foreign education credentials evaluated for US immigration purposes.

parameters.name: country_of_education
parameters.description: Country where education was obtained

parameters.name: degree_type
parameters.description: Type of degree or credential

parameters.name: purpose
parameters.description: Purpose of evaluation (H-1B, EB-2, EB-3, licensure)

returnDescription: Recommended credential evaluation agencies (NACES members), US degree equivalency, and specific requirements by visa category.

name: check_treaty_investor_countries
description: Returns the list of countries that have E-1 treaty trader or E-2 treaty investor agreements with the United States.

parameters.name: treaty_type
parameters.description: Type of treaty to check (E-1, E-2, or both)

parameters.name: nationality
parameters.description: Specific nationality to check treaty status for

returnDescription: Treaty status for the specified country, list of treaty countries if no specific nationality given, and treaty-specific requirements.

name: get_humanitarian_parole_info
description: Provides information about humanitarian parole programs, eligibility criteria, and application process for urgent humanitarian reasons.

parameters.name: country_of_origin
parameters.description: Applicant's country of origin

parameters.name: urgency_basis
parameters.description: Basis for humanitarian urgency (medical, family reunification, conflict)

parameters.name: program_name
parameters.description: Specific parole program if applicable (e.g., Uniting for Ukraine, CHNV)

returnDescription: Available parole programs, eligibility requirements, application process, duration of parole, and follow-up immigration options.
